### executeObjcopyOnBinary() {#a03da0184bacf98a2a34f81413e7159b4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Error llvm::objcopy::coff::executeObjcopyOnBinary (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/commonconfig">CommonConfig</a> &amp; Config, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coffconfig">COFFConfig</a> &amp; COFFConfig, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/object/coffobjectfile">object::COFFObjectFile</a> &amp; In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Out)</>}>
Apply the transformations described by <code>Config</code> and <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/coffconfig">COFFConfig</a></code> to <code>In</code> and writes the result into <code>Out</code>.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> encountered whilst performing the operation.
</SectionUser>
